review_text: The series was absolutely fantastic and well-acted! Perfect casting and coordination!
I was not satisfied with the plot, could have had better twists and turns and also very predictable
Amazing plot twists and nostalgic 80s vibes. The kids’ performances are top-notch!
Mind-bending and brilliantly executed. Easily one of the smartest shows ever.
Got too confusing by the end. Needed a chart to understand it!
Too slow at times, but still manages to keep the royal intrigue alive.
Breaking Bad is a masterpiece of storytelling. The character development of Walter White is phenomenal, and every episode keeps you hooked. Easily one of the best shows ever made
Honestly, the pacing was too slow for me. It felt dragged out at times, especially in the middle seasons. Not as thrilling as people make it sound
Too much focus on the science and not enough on the action. I couldn’t connect with any of the characters — it felt dark and depressing rather than exciting.
Money Heist has an interesting concept and stylish direction. While some episodes are intense and engaging, others feel repetitive. Overall, it’s entertaining but not something I’d rewatch soon.
Season 1 was good, and very interesting, but season 2 was very vague and no proper story line, disappointed with the plot twists and climax!
The series was good, but casting could have been better, it felt slow and dull! overall, not a good watch!
The movie was really great! Slow and very interesting, twists and reveals were amazing! I would recommend to a fellow mate
It was a bad movie! The plot could have been better!
It is a really good series, the cast was perfect, totally worth watching!
It was a really nice series! Interesting with many different characters, I really loved the plot and was intrigued to play this! lol!
bad movie! not recommended for young children! Only one time watchable!
